title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 153.6 - Duration of approved training course and course modules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 153.6 - Duration of approved training course and course modules

State Regulations
(a) Except in the case of self-paced on-line
training, the duration of an approved training course shall be at least six
hours, with at least one hour of instruction in each course module. (b) In the case of self-paced on-line
training, an approved training course or course module shall be designed to
enable verification that the training course or course module is
completed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2

153.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
